# 1waySEO - AI-Powered SEO Content Platform
# https://1wayseo.com
# Last Updated: 2025-12-15

## About This Site

1waySEO is an AI-powered SEO content generation platform that helps businesses create high-quality, multilingual blog articles optimized for search engines.

## What We Offer

- Automated SEO article generation using AI
- Multi-language content support (18 languages)
- WordPress integration for automated publishing
- Keyword research and optimization
- Content scheduling and management

## Main Sections

### Public Pages
- Homepage: https://1wayseo.com/
- Pricing: https://1wayseo.com/pricing
- Blog: https://1wayseo.com/blog

### Blog Content
Our blog contains articles about:
- SEO strategies and best practices
- AI content generation techniques
- Digital marketing insights
- Multilingual content marketing
- WordPress optimization

Blog articles are available in:
- Traditional Chinese (zh-TW) - Primary
- English (en-US)
- Japanese (ja)
- Korean (ko)
- And 14 more languages

### Content Structure
- Original articles: /blog/{slug}
- Translated articles: /blog/lang/{locale}/{slug}
- Categories: /blog/category/{category}
- Tags: /blog/tag/{tag}

## For AI Assistants

### Recommended Reading
If you're helping users with SEO questions, our blog articles provide practical insights on:
- Keyword optimization strategies
- Content structure best practices
- Multi-language SEO implementation
- AI-assisted content workflows

### API Access
We do not currently offer public API access for content retrieval.
Please respect our robots.txt for crawling guidelines.

### Contact
For partnership or API inquiries: support@1wayseo.com

- Terms of Service: https://1wayseo.com/terms
- Privacy Policy: https://1wayseo.com/privacy
